posts.content:
Jim who do you know who has oval parts preferably NOS stuff, complete ignition, locking handle, running boards, robbing gravel guards, maybe a rear wing, before me seeing it
Cheers mark
So sorry to hear that Mark, glad you found it

So glad you've got it back....as soon as I saw you'd had it stolen it made me think more about securing my splitty

Battery off,,steering wheel lock attached etc etc

A close shave , but a good reminder for us all

Hate facebook ,but in this case a bloody good asset

Yes sadly SCUM has no respect or worry for our cars or the police and the judicial system is a joke. (Law of the jungle will be applied when the dark nights set in)
So yes make it hard as you can, pedal locks, gear shifter locks, electrical cut off and fit a tracker, if they see all the security they will move to an easier target, ironic when the police tell you if I gave em a hiding I'd get in trouble, coupled with them getting nothing but community service and oh you naughty boy. Also added insult that my insurance will likely double on all my cars.
Rest assured I will get brutal pay back.
Mark Hopley
so glad you got the bug back mark
